couldNotSignInWithGoogle: Could not sign in with Google
couldNotSignInWithApple: Could not sign in with Apple
byLoggingInYouAgreeToOur: By logging in, you agree to our
guideAddCryptoCurrencyDescription:
To add a crypto currency to your portfolio tap "Add new crypto" button and search for your currency using the search bar at the top of the opened dialog.

Once you have added your crypto by tapping on it the currency detail screen will be opened where you can add buy records.
guideAddBuyRecordsDescription:
Click "Add new buy record" button on the currency detail screen and enter the buy price and the amount of the currency you bought.

 When you tap "Add" the buy record will be created. You can add as many buy records as you want.

You can also edit or delete a buy record by tapping on it.
guideFavouritesDescription:
You can add a crypto to your favourites using the star icon on the currency detail screen or by tapping the "Add favourite" button on the home screen.

All your favourite cryptocurrencies can be viewed at the top section of the home screen.

To remove a cryptocurrency from favourites simply click the star icon again on the currency detail page.
guideSettingsDescription:
App's color theme, display language and the default fiat currency can be changed in settings.

You can get to settings by tapping the icon at the top right of the home screen.

You are able to delete your account using the "Delete account" button from the setting's "Danger zone" section if you no longer want to use Walue. This action is irreversible.
errorWhileFetchingRecords: An error occured while fetching records, Walue will attempt another fetch in a moment!
errorWhileFetchingCryptocurrencies: An error occured while fetching crypto currencies, check your connection and try again!
languageDescription: Language in which the app is displayed
yourAccountWillBeDeletedYouSure: Your account and all of its associated data will be deleted. Are you sure you want continue?
typeDelete: Type DELETE to the field below to confirm account deletion.
